body_html:
another option is this:
after you pip install tensorflow-gpu, run these commands:
(Remove both tensorflow and tensorflow-gpu, and reinstall tensorflow-gpu with no deps)

pip uninstall tensorflow
pip install tensorflow-gpu --no-deps --upgrade
body_text:
another option is this:
after you pip install tensorflow-gpu, run these commands:
(Remove both tensorflow and tensorflow-gpu, and reinstall tensorflow-gpu with no deps)
pip uninstall tensorflow
pip install tensorflow-gpu --no-deps --upgrade
body:
another option is this:
after you pip install tensorflow-gpu, run these commands:
(Remove both tensorflow and tensorflow-gpu, and reinstall tensorflow-gpu with no deps)

```
pip uninstall tensorflow
pip install tensorflow-gpu --no-deps --upgrade
```
